reviewText: Excellent video on the use of the classic fighting handgun!
The video was great as far as content but the quality of the disk was terrible I've ordered it twice and both times I only watched it 1 time and it would freeze up and looked like sun spots on it
Good - did learn a few things from this DVD - enjoyed it.
Awesome video!!!  great review of basics!

Very Informative. Covers everything from safety to malfunctions and a little history on the 1911.  Interesting, I recommend this DVD whether you own a 1911 or not, but highly recommended if you own one.

Overall, a good value. The quality of the production is superb with excellent audio and video.  Although the video focuses on the 1911, many of the techniques discussed are similar to those presented in official federal government courses.
